mdRecord.dcterms:description: Family, SEATED, FIRST ROW, left hand TO right hand: Howard Gesner Kidd (1/3/04-12/30/95); Alice Ives Payne Kidd (12/29/1879-3/22/64); James Warrenton Kidd (8/10/15- ); Charles Leonard Kidd (7/1/1870-6/27/52); Martha Alice Kidd (10/25/17- ) SECOND ROW: Walter Francis Kidd (11/18/05-2/28/96); Carolyn Lois Kidd (10-18-13-?); Beulah Margaret Kidd (3/5/07- ) THIRD ROW: Charles Edwin Kidd (3/25/02-11/7/84); George Morris Kidd (9/24/00-8/12/71) [data provided by Jim E. Kidd, son of George Morris Kidd and Samuel P. Clarke]
